languages.text: {n}На металлическом столе, в окружении искрящих спиралей из медной проволоки, возлежит тело {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}. Иссушенная плоть покрыта пленкой священной машинной смазки, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} заботливо отполированы. Cкрещенные руки и обнаженный торс покрыты замысловатыми электу, а голову мертвеца обвивают жгуты проводов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На металлическом столе, в окружении искрящих спиралей из медной проволоки, возлежит тело {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}. Иссушенная плоть покрыта пленкой священной машинной смазки, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} заботливо отполированы. Cкрещенные руки и обнаженный торс покрыты замысловатыми электу, а голову мертвеца обвивают жгуты проводов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

Иссушенная плоть покрыта пленкой священной машинной смазки, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} заботливо отполированы. Cкрещенные руки и обнаженный торс покрыты замысловатыми электу, а голову мертвеца обвивают жгуты проводов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leiche eines {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} ruht auf einem Metalltisch, umgeben von blitzenden Kupferspiralen. Eine Patina heiliger Salböle bedeckt sein vertrocknetes Fleisch. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} wurden mit größter Sorgfalt poliert. Komplizierte Elektoos bedecken die verschränkten Arme und den nackten Torso des Toten, und Kabel umhüllen seinen Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leiche eines {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} ruht auf einem Metalltisch, umgeben von blitzenden Kupferspiralen. Eine Patina heiliger Salböle bedeckt sein vertrocknetes Fleisch. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} wurden mit größter Sorgfalt poliert. Komplizierte Elektoos bedecken die verschränkten Arme und den nackten Torso des Toten, und Kabel umhüllen seinen Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entouré de spirales de cuivre émettant des étincelles, le cadavre d'un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} repose sur une table en métal. Une couche d'onguents sacrés recouvre sa peau flétrie. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} ont été polies avec grand soin. Des électrotatouages complexes recouvrent les bras croisés ainsi que le torse nu du cadavre, et des câbles lui ceignent la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entouré de spirales de cuivre émettant des étincelles, le cadavre d'un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} repose sur une table en métal. Une couche d'onguents sacrés recouvre sa peau flétrie. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétiques{/g} ont été polies avec grand soin. Des électrotatouages complexes recouvrent les bras croisés ainsi que le torse nu du cadavre, et des câbles lui ceignent la tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一具{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}的尸体平躺在金属桌子上，周身围着一圈冒着火花的铜线。干瘪的肉体上涂满了神圣机油，{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}也经过了精心保养。交叉的手臂和裸露的躯干上铭刻着错综复杂的电镀体，头部还缠绕着几缕电线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一具{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}的尸体平躺在金属桌子上，周身围着一圈冒着火花的铜线。干瘪的肉体上涂满了神圣机油，{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}也经过了精心保养。交叉的手臂和裸露的躯干上铭刻着错综复杂的电镀体，头部还缠绕着几缕电线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の遺体が横たわる金属テーブルは、きらめく銅コイルの渦に囲まれている。聖なる軟膏により、しなびた肉体は古めかしい艶を帯びている。男の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}は、とても丁寧に磨かれていた。複雑なエレクトゥーが死んだ男の交差した腕とむき出しの胴体を埋め尽くし、よりあわせたケーブルがその頭を覆っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の遺体が横たわる金属テーブルは、きらめく銅コイルの渦に囲まれている。聖なる軟膏で、しなびた肉体が古めかしい艶を帯びている。男の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}は、とても丁寧に磨かれていた。複雑なエレクトゥーが死んだ男の交差した腕とむき出しの胴体を埋め尽くし、よりあわせたケーブルが男の頭を覆っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo de un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} descansa sobre una mesa de metal, rodeado de espirales chispeantes de bobinas de cobre. Una capa de ungüentos sagrados cubre su carne marchita. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} han sido perfeccionados con gran esmero. Intrincados electoos cubren los brazos cruzados y el torso desnudo del cadáver, y filamentos de cables envuelven su cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo de un {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} descansa sobre una mesa de metal, rodeado de espirales chispeantes de bobinas de cobre. Una capa de ungüentos sagrados cubre su carne marchita. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}auméticos{/g} han sido perfeccionados con gran esmero. Intrincados electoos cubren los brazos cruzados y el torso desnudo del cadáver, y filamentos de cables envuelven su cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kıvılcımlar saçan bakır spiral bobinlerle çevrili {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} cesedi, metal masanın üzerinde uzanıyor. Yeşil küfe dönmüş kutsal özyağ, çürüyen etlerini kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Ogmetiklerinin{/g} büyük bir titizlikle cilalandığı belli oluyor. Karmaşık elektrodövmeler ölü adamın kavuşturulmuş kollarını ve çıplak gövdesini kaplıyor, başını ise kablo demetleri sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s body rests on a metal table, surrounded by sparking spirals of copper coil. A patina of sacred unguents covers his withered flesh. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetics{/g} have been polished with great care. Intricate electoos cover the dead man's crossed arms and bare torso, and strands of wires envelop his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kıvılcımlar saçan bakır spiral bobinlerle çevrili {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in cesedi, metal masanın üzerinde uzanıyor. Yeşil küf hâlini almış kutsal özyağ, çürüyen etlerini kaplıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Ogmetik{/g}lerinin büyük bir titizlikle cilalandığı belli oluyor. Karmaşık elektrodövmeler ölü adamın kavuşturulmuş kollarını ve çıplak gövdesini kaplıyor, başını ise kablo demetleri sarıyor.{/n}
